Defines the inventory item.
API Version: 2020-10-01-preview.

{{% examples %}}

## Example Usage

{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}


### CreateInventoryItem


{{< example csharp >}}

```csharp
using Pulumi;
using AzureNative = Pulumi.AzureNative;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var inventoryItem = new AzureNative.ConnectedVMwarevSphere.InventoryItem("inventoryItem", new AzureNative.ConnectedVMwarevSphere.InventoryItemArgs
        {
            InventoryItemName = "testItem",
            InventoryType = "ResourcePool",
            ResourceGroupName = "testrg",
            VcenterName = "ContosoVCenter",
        });
    }

}

```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example go >}}


```go
package main

import (
	connectedvmwarevsphere "github.com/pulumi/pulumi-azure-native/sdk/go/azure/connectedvmwarevsphere"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := connectedvmwarevsphere.NewInventoryItem(ctx, "inventoryItem", &connectedvmwarevsphere.InventoryItemArgs{
			InventoryItemName: pulumi.String("testItem"),
			InventoryType:     pulumi.String("ResourcePool"),
			ResourceGroupName: pulumi.String("testrg"),
			VcenterName:       pulumi.String("ContosoVCenter"),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}

```


{{< /example >}}

```python
import pulumi
import pulumi_azure_native as azure_native

inventory_item = azure_native.connectedvmwarevsphere.InventoryItem("inventoryItem",
    inventory_item_name="testItem",

    resource_group_name="testrg",
    vcenter_name="ContosoVCenter")

```

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";

const inventoryItem = new azure_native.connectedvmwarevsphere.InventoryItem("inventoryItem", {
```

<a href="#managed_resource_id_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">managed_<wbr>resource_<wbr>id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Gets or sets the tracked resource id corresponding to the inventory resource.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="mo_name_python">
<a href="#mo_name_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">mo_<wbr>name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Gets or sets the vCenter Managed Object name for the inventory item.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="mo_ref_id_python">
<a href="#mo_ref_id_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">mo_<wbr>ref_<wbr>id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Gets or sets the MoRef (Managed Object Reference) ID for the inventory item.{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

## Supporting Types



<h4 id="inventorytype">Inventory<wbr>Type</h4>

    <dd>VirtualMachine</dd><dt>Virtual<wbr>Machine<wbr>Template</dt>
    <dd>VirtualMachineTemplate</dd><dt>Virtual<wbr>Network</dt>
    <dd>VirtualNetwork</dd><dt>Cluster</dt>
    <dd>Cluster</dd><dt>Datastore</dt>
    <dd>Datastore</dd><dt>Host</dt>
    <dd>Host</dd></dl>

    <dd>VirtualNetwork</dd><dt>Inventory<wbr>Type<wbr>Cluster</dt>
    <dd>Cluster</dd><dt>Inventory<wbr>Type<wbr>Datastore</dt>

## Import


An existing resource can be imported using its type token, name, and identifier, e.g.

```sh
$ pulumi import azure-native:connectedvmwarevsphere:InventoryItem testItem /subscriptions/fd3c3665-1729-4b7b-9a38-238e83b0f98b/resourceGroups/testrg/providers/Microsoft.ConnectedVMwarevSphere/VCenters/ContosoVCenter/InventoryItems/testItem 
```

	<dt>Repository</dt>
	<dd><a href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-azure-native">https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-azure-native</a></dd>
	<dt>License</dt>
	<dd>Apache-2.0</dd>
</dl>
